channel.title: How should I inform players of a unique feature within a skill?
channel.description:
[size=12pt][center]I want to make skill and everything about the skill accessible at one spot (preferable completely involved with 1 npc at that spot). So my question to you is how should I implement it? How should I make it seem delightful and less painful?
Thanks.[/center][/size]

item.title: How should I inform players of a unique feature within a skill?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:4, topic:526452”]It’s Runecape. there’s no way to make the grinding less painful :p[/quote] exp rates? just make it 98 on login and have them train that one level.

Read full topic
item.source: How should I inform players of a unique feature within a skill?

item.title: How should I inform players of a unique feature within a skill?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

You want the skill to be performed at one spot?
Then make a teleport somewhere and put the utilities for the skill there I guess.

Read full topic
